Context.name: availableWorkers
Context.Documentation: If available workers near the machine is less than equal to 10 and demand is low, deploy Manual Model. If available workers near the machine is less than equal to 10 and demand is high, deploy Automated Model. If available workers near the machine is more than 10 and demand is low, deploy Manual Model. If available workers near the machine is more than 10 and demand is high, deploy Automated Model with 10 People and remaining workers could be engaged in other works. (Optimization)

Context.name: unitsOrdered
Context.Documentation: A demand is LOW if no. of units ordered is less than equal to 1000, else demand is said to be HIGH.

Context.name: infraredSensorStatus
Context.Documentation: If a sensor node is working fine, deploy the Automated Model (without Repair action). If some sensor node is faulty, deploy the Automated Model (with Repair action).

Context.name: shockDetectorStatus
Context.Documentation: If a sensor node is working fine, deploy the Automated Model (without Repair action). If some sensor node is faulty, deploy the Automated Model (with Repair action).
